mapper.sql: QuestionRecord_ID, QuestionRecord_Status, QuestionRecord_Memo, QuestionRecord_CreateTime, QuestionRecord_ModifyTIme, QuestionRecord_Version, QuestionRecord_StudentID, QuestionRecord_QuestionID, QuestionRecord_AnswerResult, QuestionRecord_Type, QuestionRecord_ContinuedTime
mapper.select: SELECT count(*) FROM rb_QuestionRecords WHERE QuestionRecord_StudentID = #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT} GROUP BY QuestionRecord_Type
SELECT QuestionRecord_Type FROM rb_QuestionRecords,rb_gamepart WHERE QuestionRecord_StudentID = #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT} AND QuestionRecord_Type = game_Id GROUP BY QuestionRecord_Type

SELECT QuestionRecord_CreateTime FROM rb_QuestionRecords WHERE QuestionRecord_StudentID = #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT} AND QuestionRecord_Type = #{gameId,jdbcType=INTEGER} ORDER BY QuestionRecord_CreateTime DESC LIMIT 1
